name: Aconex Limited
description: Aconex Limited is a leading provider of cloud-based collaboration solutions for the construction and engineering industries. Founded in 2000, Aconex has established itself as a key player in the global market by streamlining project communication and document management. The company's flagship platform enables teams to collaborate effectively, manage project documents, and facilitate real-time communication across all stakeholders, including architects, contractors, and clients. Aconex is particularly known for its ability to manage large-scale projects in complex environments, ensuring that all project information is accessible and organized. With a commitment to innovation, Aconex has integrated advanced technologies such as mobile access and data analytics to enhance user experience and project outcomes. The company serves a diverse range of sectors, including infrastructure, commercial, and industrial projects, and has a strong international presence, with clients in over 70 countries. Aconex aims to improve project delivery and reduce risks through its comprehensive suite of tools, enabling organizations to achieve greater efficiency and transparency throughout the project lifecycle.

faq.answer: Aconex is headquartered in Melbourne, Australia.

faq.answer: Aconex's main products include document management, workflow management, and project management solutions.
